Title: Far from Men
Writer: Albert Camus (short story: L'HÃ´te), Antoine Lacomblez (collaboration), David Oelhoffen (screenplay)
Actors: Viggo Mortensen, Reda Kateb, Djemel Barek, Vincent Martin
Plot: Algeria, 1954. Two very different men thrown together by a world in turmoil are forced to flee across the Atlas mountains. Daru, the reclusive teacher, has to escort Mohamed, a villager accused of murder.
